'''Garrett Nolston''' is the son of [[Jacob Nolston]].

==History==
Garrett came to the hospital when his father was brought there with a sternal infection. While he went into surgery, their mom took the kids to get something to eat. ''("[[Crash Into Me, Part 1]]")''

His father came through his surgery and was expected to make a full recovery. ''("[[Crash Into Me, Part 2]]")''

==Relationships==
===Familial===
When his father was hospitalized, the whole family was worried about him.
